snippet.title: Path Out - Free on Steam & Itch - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Path Out is an autobiographical narrative adventure by the Syrian refugee Abdullah Karam with support from Causa Creations, now FREE on Steam & itch.io (PC & Mac). During the game Abdullah utilizes YouTube-style commentary videos to speak to players, providing insights into his epic escape.

Find out more:
http://path-out.net
http://store.steampowered.com/app/725980/Path_Out
http://www.twitter.com/causacreations
http://www.facebook.com/causacreations

Support the project by donating via itch.io:
http://causacreations.itch.io/path-out

Trailer by Reinhold Bidner, filming by Stephanie Meisl & sound rec by Ryan Garcia.
